metadata.title: CVE-2021-3838 on Ubuntu 22.04 LTS (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
[Unknown description]

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2021-3838` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

php-dompdf - 0.6.2+dfsg-3.1ubuntu0.1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: php-dompdf package in jammy was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '0.6.2+dfsg-3.1ubuntu0.1').
